chinese: 供应伙食；为（集会、婚礼等）承办
english: cater

chinese: 我们可以为婚礼、派对、宴席提供餐饮服务。
english: We are able to cater for weddings, parties and banquets

chinese: 加.隔开物，隔墙，隔板 V隔开
english: partition

chinese: 我们的会议室被一面玻璃隔墙给隔开了。
english: Our meeting room is separated by a glass partition

chinese: vt. 实施，执行
english: implement

chinese: 我用这些工具来打理我的花园。
english: I use these implements to take care of my garden

chinese: n.欢呼，赞扬，称赞 vt.欢呼，喝彩，鼓掌欢迎；推选
english: acclaim

chinese: 她因自己出色的成绩受到了高度称赞。
english: She was highly acclaimed for her wonderful performance

chinese: v.啄；轻吻 D.轻吻
english: peck

chinese: 这只鸡在啄食地上的谷物。
english: The chicken is pecking the grains on the ground

chinese: 展开，伸展
english: unfold

chinese: 他展开地图，想看看接下来走哪条路。
english: He unfolds the map to see which way to go next

chinese: adj.男女平等
english: feminist

chinese: 女权主义者呼吁女性应当享有平等的权利。
english: Feminists call for equal rights for women and girls

chinese: n.专题报告会
english: symposium

chinese: 我们举办一个专题研讨会来谈论如何提改善政府决策。
english: Let's hold a symposium to talk about how to improve government policy

chinese: v.登记，注册；（仪表等）显示n.登记表，注册表
english: register

chinese: 运动员们正在登记，报名参加环绕公园的半程马拉松。
english: The athletes are registering for a half-marathon around the park

chinese: n.爱国者
english: patriot

chinese: 那位爱国者在向国旗敬礼。
english: That patriot is saluting the national flag

chinese: adj，生态的，生态学的
english: ecological

chinese: 人与自然之间的生态平衡对地球至关重要。
english: An ecological balance between humans and nature is essential for the planet

chinese: adj，行政的，管理的
english: administrative

chinese: 她一整天都忙于行政工作。
english: She was busy with administrative work all day

chinese: n.踏脚板 v.蹬脚踏板；骑车 ad）. 脚踏的
english: pedal

chinese: 他在用脚踩汽车的刹车踏板。
english: He is using his foot to push down on the brake pedal of the car

chinese: v. 抓住；领会，理解 n，紧握
english: grasp

chinese: 这个婴儿抓着妈妈的手指。
english: The baby grasped her mother's finger

chinese: n.指导者，教员，教练
english: instructor

chinese: 驾校教练正在指导他的学生学习倒车。
english: The driving instructor is helping his student learn how to back a car

chinese: n.根除
english: eradication

chinese: 他们希望根除田里的杂草后能获得更好的收成。
english: They hoped that the eradication of weeds across the field would yield a better crop
